reviewText: it works and helps advanced to beginer

this is for models and also pageants. I rented this one...  got it beacause i may model mother of the bride clothes for wedding fashion shows and needed to reveiw turns. ( i did compete in a pageant 30 years ago wish i knew this stuff back then, and modeled some ) this is very good and helpful as it pertains to both, but more for pageants. Worth buying though.. i would have given this a 5 star rating if it included more modeling turns but these are mostly for pageant evening and swimwear although you can use it for modeling. . I recommend it for both!
